globalblocking-target:
Form label for the target of the block.
Identical to {{msg-mw|block-target}}.
See also {{msg-mw|globalblocking-target-with-block-ids}}.
globalblocking-target-with-block-ids:
Form label for the target of the block.
Similar to {{msg-mw|ipaddressorusername}}.
See also {{msg-mw|globalblocking-target}}.
globalblocking-ipbanononly:
Label for checkbox asking if the blocker wants to globally block anonymous users only. The checkbox is disabled if the target of the block is a username.
Similar to {{msg-mw|ipb-hardblock}}.
globalblocking-block-disable-account-cre:
Label for the checkbox asking if the blocker wants to prevent account creation globally for this target. The checkbox is checked by default.
Similar to {{msg-mw|ipbcreateaccount}}.
globalblocking-block-enable-autoblock:
{{doc-singularthey}}
Label for the checkbox used to enable the 'global autoblocks' feature for the global block, which causes automatic global IP blocks on IP addresses the globally blocked user tries to use. The checkbox is disabled when the target is not an account.

Parameters:
* $1 - The number of IP addresses which will be retroactively autoblocked.
* $2 - The duration of the automatic global IP block.

Similar to {{msg-mw|ipbenableautoblock}}.
globalblocking-block-target-invalid:
Used as error message on Special:GlobalBlock if the target entered was invalid.

Parameters:
* $1 - The target entered by the user, which is invalid.
globalblocking-block-expiryinvalid: Used as error message on Special:GlobalBlock if expiry time entered was invalid.
globalblocking-block-anononly-on-account: Used as error message on Special:GlobalBlock if the blocker tries to globally block an account when they have specified that the block should only apply to anonymous users.
globalblocking-block-enable-autoblock-on: Used as an error message on Special:GlobalBlock if the blocker tries to globally block an IP address or IP range with autoblocks enabled.
globalblocking-local-failed: Shown if blocking the target of the block locally failed when global blocks on accounts are enabled.
globalblocking-block-failure:
Error message shown when the username, IP address, or IP range used as the target could not be blocked globally.
Parameters:
* $1 is the target (which can be a username, IP address, or IP range).
globalblocking-block-alreadyblocked:
Used as error message if the provided target is already blocked. Parameters:
* $1 - IP address, IP range, or username
globalblocking-bigrange:
Used as error message to be shown when the user creating a global block tries to apply a IP address range block that exceeds the set limits.

Parameters:
* $1 - the IP address range
* $2 - the type of IP range (IPv4 or IPv6)
* $3 - the numeric value of the range limit
globalblocking-also-local-talk: Form label for a checkbox that when checked prevents the user from editing their talk page for the local block that is applied.
globalblocking-also-local-email: Form label for a checkbox asking if the blocker wants to block email on the local block (only applies if the user specifies that a local block should also be applied).
globalblocking-also-local-soft: Label for checkbox which if checked will make the local block only apply to anonymous users. This checkbox is disabled if the target of the block is a user.
globalblocking-also-local-disable-accoun: Label for a checkbox which if checked will make the local block prevent account creation. This checkbox is checked by default.
globalblocklist-summary:
Appears on top of Special:GlobalBlockList. Example is on [[wikipedia:Special:Globalblocklist]].

Similar in purpose to {{msg-mw|blocklist-summary}}, but has a message defined.
globalblocking-list-target-invalid:
Used as error message in Special:GlobalBlockList if the target entered for the block is invalid. Parameters:
* $1 - Username, IP address or IP range.
globalblocking-list-table-cell-by:
{{optional}} Used to construct the value for a cell in the Special:GlobalBlockList table, which represents the performer of the global block referenced in the table row.

Parameters:
* $3 - the blocking user link
* $4 - the source wiki for the blocking user
globalblocking-list-table-cell-expiry:
{{optional}} Used to construct the value for a cell in the Special:GlobalBlockList table, which represents the expiry and some action links (if the user has the rights to see them).

Parameters:
* $1 - The expiry of the global block
* $2 - The action links
globalblocking-list-whitelisted:
Used as a flag shown next to existing blocks on Special:GlobalBlockList. Indicates that the given block is locally disabled on the current wiki.
Parameters:
* $1 - The username of the user who disabled the block
* $2 - The reason provided for disabling the block
globalblocking-list-block:
Link text used in action links on Special:CentralAuth to allow a user to globally block a central user.
Identical to {{msg-mw|blocklink}}
globalblocking-list-table-heading-timest:
This is a column header for dates and times in the table on the page [[Special:GlobalBlockList]]. Similar to {{msg-mw|blocklist-timestamp}}. 
{{Identical|Timestamp}}
globalblocking-list-table-heading-target:
The table header for the column containing the block targets, that is usernames or IP addresses linked to their respective user pages, in the table on the page [[Special:GlobalBlockList]]. Similar to {{msg-mw|blocklist-target}}. 
{{Identical|Target}}
globalblocking-list-table-heading-expiry:
This is a column header in the table on the page [[Special:GlobalBlockList]]. Similar to {{msg-mw|blocklist-expiry}}.
{{Identical|Expire}}
globalblocking-list-table-heading-by: This is a column header in the table on the page [[Special:GlobalBlockList]]. Similar to {{msg-mw|blocklist-by}}.
globalblocking-list-table-heading-params: This is a column header in the table on the page [[Special:GlobalBlockList]]. Similar to {{msg-mw|blocklist-params}}.
globalblocking-list-table-heading-reason:
This is a column header in the table on the page [[Special:GlobalBlockList]]. Similar to {{msg-mw|blocklist-reason}}.

{{Identical|Reason}}
globalblocking-add-block: Link to Special:GlobalBlock. Shown on Special:GlobalBlock below the success message: {{msg-mw|globalblocking-block-success}}.
globalblocking-notblocked:
Used as error message in Special:GlobalBlockStatus and Special:RemoveGlobalBlock. Parameters:
* $1 - IP address, range, or username

See also:
* {{msg-mw|globalblocking-notblocked-id}}
globalblocking-notblocked-id:
Used as error message in Special:GlobalBlockStatus and Special:RemoveGlobalBlock. Parameters:
* $1 - Global block ID which does not correspond to an existing global block

See also:
* {{msg-mw|globalblocking-notblocked}}
globalblocking-unblock-unblocked:
Used as success message in [[Special:GlobalUnblock]].
Similar to {{msg-mw|globalblocking-unblock-unblocked-for-id-target}}

Parameters:
* $1 - Username, IP address, or IP range
globalblocking-unblock-unblocked-for-id-:
Used as success message in [[Special:GlobalUnblock]].
Similar to {{msg-mw|globalblocking-unblock-unblocked}}

Parameters:
* $1 - Global block ID
globalblocking-whitelist-notapplied: Error message shown on Special:GlobalBlockWhitelist when global blocks are not applied on the wiki.
globalblocking-whitelist-statuslabel: Used as a checkbox label on Special:GlobalBlockWhitelist. When checked the global block is to be disabled on the local wiki when the user submits the form.
globalblocking-whitelist-whitelisted:
Used as success message in Special:GlobalBlockStatus. Parameters:
* $1 - Username, IP address, or IP range
* $2 - global block ID
globalblocking-whitelist-dewhitelisted:
Used as success message in Special:GlobalBlockStatus. Parameters:
* $1 - Username, IP address, or IP range
* $2 - global block ID
globalblocking-whitelist-whitelisted-tar:
Used as success message in Special:GlobalBlockStatus.
Similar to {{msg-mw|globalblocking-whitelist-whitelisted}}

Parameters:
* $1 - global block ID
globalblocking-whitelist-dewhitelisted-t:
Used as success message in Special:GlobalBlockStatus.
Similar to {{msg-mw|globalblocking-whitelist-dewhitelisted}}

Parameters:
* $1 - global block ID
globalblocking-whitelist-nochange: Error message shown on Special:GlobalBlockWhitelist when no change has been made to the local status of the block.
globalblocking-whitelist-intro: Used as an introductory text on Special:GlobalWhitelist.
globalblocking-logpagetext: Shown as header of [[Special:Log/gblblock]] (part of [[mw:Extension:GlobalBlocking|Extension:GlobalBlocking]], which is not installed on translatewiki.net; example: [[wikipedia:Special:Log/gblblock]])
globalblocking-logentry-block-old-format:
{{Logentry|[[m:Special:Log/gblblock]]}}
Additional parameters:
* $4 - (optional) the username, IP range, or IP address who is the target (to be used with GENDER)
* $5 - block detail flags or empty string
globalblocking-logentry-block:
{{Logentry|[[m:Special:Log/gblblock]]}}
Additional parameters:
* $4 - (optional) the username, IP range, or IP address who is the target (to be used with GENDER)
* $5 - the block duration, localized and formatted
* $6 - block detail flags or empty string
globalblocking-logentry-modify-old-forma:
{{Logentry|[[m:Special:Log/gblblock]]}}
Additional parameters:
* $4 - (optional) the username, IP range, or IP address who is the target (to be used with GENDER)
* $5 - block detail flags or empty string
globalblocking-logentry-modify:
{{Logentry|[[m:Special:Log/gblblock]]}}
Additional parameters:
* $4 - (optional) the username, IP range, or IP address who is the target (to be used with GENDER)
* $5 - the block duration, localized and formatted
* $6 - block detail flags or empty string
globalblocking-loglink:
Shown on [[Special:Block]] when a user is blocked globally.

Parameters:
* $1: Username, IP address, or IP range
globalblocking-contribs-mock-log-line:
Displayed on [[Special:Contributions]] for currently globally blocked accounts, IP addresses, and IP ranges. Used to describe the active global block on the target of the Special:Contributions page.

Parameters:
* $1 - The pre-formatted timestamp that the global block was performed, with a link
* $2 - The username of the performer of the global block for GENDER
* $3 - HTML user link for the performer of the global block
* $4 - The username of the target of the global block, which may be empty if the user cannot see the current target. Used for GENDER.
* $5 - The formatted HTML for a user link to the target, or HTML indicating that the target is hidden
* $6 - The expiration time of the global block
* $7 - Block options in parentheses
* $8 - The reason given for the global block
* $9 - Action links for managing the global block (may or may not be present depending on the user rights of the user).
globalblocking-blockedtext-all-wikis: Used as a component of a global block message.
globalblocking-blockedtext-on-range: Used as a component of a global block message.
globalblocking-blockedtext-on-proxy: Used as a component of a global block message.
globalblocking-blockedtext-on-user: Used as a component of a global block message.
globalblocking-blockedtext-autoblock-rea:
Used as a component of a global block message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the reason for the global block that triggered this global autoblock
globalblocking-blockedtext-autoblock-int:
Used as a component of a global block message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the username target of the global block that triggered this global autoblock

Used as a component of a global block message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the username target of the global block that triggered this global autoblock
globalblocking-blockedtext-blocker-admin:
Used as component for a global block error message. Parameters:
* $1 - the blocking sysop (with a link to their user page if they are a local user)
globalblocking-blockedtext-email-feature: Used as component for a global block error message. Refers to {{msg-mw|Emailuser}}
globalblocking-blockedtext-ip-range:
Used as a component of a global block message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the blocked range.
globalblocking-blockedtext-proxy:
Used as a component of a global block message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the blocked proxy address.
globalblocking-blockedtext-username:
Used as a component of a global block message.

Parameters:
* $1 - the blocked user.
globalblocking-autoblocker:
Used as the reason for a global autoblock of an IP address.

Parameters:
* $1 - The target of the block that caused the global autoblock, which will be a username
* $2 - The reason given for the block that caused this global autoblock.

See also: {{msg-mw|globalblocking-autoblocker-hidden-block}}, which is used instead of this message if the target of the block is hidden.
globalblocking-autoblocker-hidden-block:
Used as the reason for a global autoblock of an IP address if the target of the block is hidden from public view.
* $1 - The global block ID of the block that caused the autoblock.

See also: {{msg-mw|globalblocking-autoblocker}}, which is used instead of this message if the target username is publicly viewable.
globalblocking-centralauth-admin-info-gl: Used as a label on Special:CentralAuth for the global account information field that displays if the user is globally blocked or not globally blocked.
globalblocking-global-autoblock-id:
Used as the target of an global autoblock, instead of displaying the autoblocked IP. Similar to {{msg-mw|autoblockid}}.

Parameters:
* $1 - autoblock ID
